akn:section.akn:heading: University of the District of Columbia Debt Collection Fund.

akn:content.akn:p: There is established as a special fund the University of the District of Columbia Debt Collection Fund (“Fund”), which shall be administered by the University of the District of Columbia in accordance with subsection (c) of this section.

The fund shall consist of the revenue from the collection of unpaid student tuition, student fees, and student loans by the Central Collection Unit in accordance with subchapter XVII of Chapter 3 of Title 1 [§ 1-350.01 et seq.].
The Fund shall be used for expenses associated with the operations of the University of the District of Columbia.
